00036 integer::integer() {
00037     _init();

00040 integer::integer(const integer& b) {
00041     _init(b);

00044 integer::integer(const ::boost::xint::integer& b) {
00045     if (b.is_nan()) throw xint::not_a_number();
00046 
00047     // Have to const_cast here, because xint::integer and xint::core::integer
00048     // aren't directly related. It's safe though.
00049     detail::data_t *bdata(const_cast<detail::data_t*>(b._get_data()));
00050     #ifdef XINT_DISABLE_COPY_ON_WRITE
00051         data=new detail::data_t(bdata);
00052     #else
00053         data=bdata;
00054     #endif
00055     _attach();
00056 }
00057 
00058 integer::integer(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00059     _init(from_string(str, base));
00060 }

00062 integer::~integer() {
00063     _detach();
00064 }

00066 void integer::_init(detail::digit_t init) {
00067     try {
00068         data=new detail::data_t(init);
00069     } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00070         throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00071     }
00072     _attach();
00073 }
00074 
00075 void integer::_init(const integer &c) {
00076     #ifdef XINT_DISABLE_COPY_ON_WRITE
00077         data=new detail::data_t(c.data);
00078     #else
00079         data=c.data;
00080     #endif
00081     _attach();
00082 }
00083 
00084 void integer::_init(boost::uintmax_t n) {
00085     static int bits=std::numeric_limits<boost::uintmax_t>::digits;
00086     static int maxDigits=(bits+detail::bits_per_digit-1)/detail::bits_per_digit;
00087 
00088     try {
00089         data=new detail::data_t;
00090     } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00091         throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00092     }
00093     _attach();
00094 
00095     data->alloc(maxDigits);
00096     for (int x=0; n != 0; ++x) {
00097         data->digits[x]=detail::digit_t(n & detail::digit_mask);
00098         n >>= detail::bits_per_digit;
00099     }
00100     data->skipLeadingZeros();
00101 }
00102 
00103 void integer::_attach() {
00104     if (data) data->attach();
00105 }
00106 
00107 void integer::_detach() {
00108     if (data && data->detach()) delete data;
00109     data=0;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void integer::_make_unique() {
00113     try {
00114         if (data && data->mCopies > 1) {
00115             detail::data_t *newstore=new detail::data_t(data);
00116             _detach();
00117             data=newstore;
00118             _attach();
00119         }
00120     } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00121         throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 void integer::_set_negative(bool negative) {
00126     if (data->mIsNegative != negative) {
00127         _make_unique();
00128         data->mIsNegative=negative;
00129         data->skipLeadingZeros();
00130     }
00131 }

00133 bool integer::odd() const {
00134     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==1);
00135 }
00136 
00137 bool integer::even() const {
00138     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==0);
00139 }
00140 
00141 int integer::sign() const {
00142     if (_get_length()==1 && _get_digit(0)==0) return 0;
00143     else return (data->mIsNegative ? -1 : 1);
00144 }
00145 
00146 size_t integer::hex_digits() const {
00147     size_t bits=log2(*this);
00148     return (bits+3)/4; // Four bits per hex digit, rounded up
00149 }
00150 
00151 integer& integer::operator+=(const integer& addend) {
00152     if ((sign() < 0) == (addend.sign() < 0)
00153         && data->mLength >= addend.data->mLength)
00154     {
00155         // Fast in-place add
00156         _make_unique();
00157         data->add(addend.data);
00158     } else {
00159         // This works for all cases
00160         *this=add(*this, addend);
00161     }
00162     return *this;
00163 }
00164 
00165 integer& integer::operator-=(const integer& subtrahend) {
00166     if (sign() >= 0 && subtrahend.sign() >= 0 && *this >= subtrahend) {
00167         // Fast in-place subtract
00168         _make_unique();
00169         data->subtract(subtrahend.data);
00170     } else {
00171         // This works for all cases
00172         *this=subtract(*this, subtrahend);
00173     }
00174     return *this;
00175 }
00176 
00177 integer& integer::operator=(const integer &c) {
00178     _detach();
00179     #ifdef XINT_DISABLE_COPY_ON_WRITE
00180         data=new detail::data_t(c.data);
00181     #else
00182         data=c.data;
00183     #endif
00184     _attach();
00185     return *this;
00186 }

00189 integer& integer::operator/=(const integer& b) { *this=divide(*this, b); return *this; }
00190 integer& integer::operator%=(const integer& b) { *this=mod(*this, b); return *this; }

00193 integer& integer::operator--() { *this -= one(); return *this; }
00194 integer  integer::operator++(int) { integer s=*this; *this += one(); return s; }
00195 integer  integer::operator--(int) { integer s=*this; *this -= one(); return s; }

00197 integer  integer::operator<<(size_t shift) const { return shift_left(*this, shift); }
00198 integer  integer::operator>>(size_t shift) const { return shift_right(*this, shift); }
00199 integer& integer::operator&=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_and(*this, n); return *this; }
00200 integer& integer::operator|=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_or(*this, n); return *this; }
00201 integer& integer::operator^=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_xor(*this, n); return *this; }
00202 
00203 integer& integer::operator<<=(size_t shift) {
00204     if (shift>0) {
00205         _make_unique();
00206         data->shift_left(shift);
00207     }
00208     return *this;
00209 }
00210 
00211 integer& integer::operator>>=(size_t shift) {
00212     if (shift>0) {
00213         _make_unique();
00214         data->shift_right(shift);
00215     }
00216     return *this;
00217 }

00233 detail::digit_t integer::_get_digit(size_t index, bool) const {

00286     // aren't directly related. It's safe though.

00316 integer::integer(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00317     try {
00318         data=0;
00319         _init(from_string(str, base));
00320     } catch (std::exception&) {
00321         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00322         delete data;
00323         data=0;
00324     }
00325 }

00333 bool integer::odd() const {
00334     if (is_nan()) {
00335         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw not_a_number();
00336         else return false;
00337     }
00338     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==1);
00339 }
00340 
00347 bool integer::even() const {
00348     if (is_nan()) {
00349         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw not_a_number();
00350         else return false;
00351     }
00352     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==0);
00353 }

00362 int integer::sign() const {
00363     if (is_nan()) {
00364         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw not_a_number();
00365         else return 0;
00366     }
00367     if (_get_length()==1 && _get_digit(0)==0) return 0;
00368     return (data->mIsNegative ? -1 : 1);
00369 }

00378 size_t integer::hex_digits() const {

00380         return core::integer(*this).hex_digits();
00381     } catch (std::exception&) {
00382         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00383         else return 0;
00384     }

00393 bool integer::is_nan() const {
00394     return (data==0);

00397 integer& integer::operator+=(const integer& addend) {
00398     try {
00399         *this=integer(core::integer(*this).operator+=(core::integer(addend)));
00400     } catch (std::exception&) {
00401         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00402         *this=integer::nan();
00403     }
00404     return *this;

00412         *this=integer::nan();

00417 integer& integer::operator=(const integer &c) {
00418     _detach();
00419     try {
00420         #ifdef XINT_DISABLE_COPY_ON_WRITE
00421             data=(c.data ? new detail::data_t(c.data) : 0);
00422         #else
00423             data=c.data;
00424         #endif
00425     } catch (std::exception&) {
00426         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00427         data=0;
00428     }
00429     _attach();
00430     return *this;
00431 }

00468 const integer& integer::zero() {

00478 const integer& integer::nan() {
00479     if (cNaN.get()==0) {
00480         integer *n=new integer();
00481         n->_detach(); // Get rid of the data
00482         n->data=0;
00483         cNaN.reset(n);
00484     }
00485     return *cNaN;
00486 }

00525 void integer::_init(boost::uintmax_t n) {
00526     static int bits=std::numeric_limits<boost::uintmax_t>::digits;
00527     static int maxDigits=(bits+detail::bits_per_digit-1)/detail::bits_per_digit;
00528 
00529     data=0;
00530     try {
00531         data=new detail::data_t;
00532         _attach();
00533 
00534         data->alloc(maxDigits);
00535         for (int x=0; n != 0; ++x) {
00536             data->digits[x]=detail::digit_t(n & detail::digit_mask);
00537             n >>= detail::bits_per_digit;
00538         }
00539         data->skipLeadingZeros();
00540     } catch (std::exception&) {
00541         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00542         delete data;
00543         data=0;
00544     }
00545 }

00556 void integer::_make_unique() {
00557     if (data && data->mCopies > 1) {
00558         detail::data_t *newstore=0;
00559         try {
00560             newstore=new detail::data_t(data);
00561         } catch (std::exception&) {
00562             if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00563             newstore=0;
00564         }
00565 
00566         _detach();
00567         data=newstore;
00568         _attach();
00569     }
00570 }

00575         data->mIsNegative=negative;
00576         data->skipLeadingZeros();
00577     }
